fu.name: FUUTEI
fu.description: A standard winning hand consisting of four melds and a pair

fu.name: CHIITOITSU
fu.description: A winning hand made up of 7 pairs

fu.name: MENZEN_KAFU
fu.description: Won from another player's discarded tile with a closed hand

fu.name: PINFU
fu.description: A special winning hand that contains no other Fu. This hand consists of: a closed hand, a valueless pair, all four melds are runs, and the winning tile was a two-sided wait

fu.name: PINFU_OPEN
fu.description: A special winning hand that contains no other Fu. This hand consists of: an open hand, a valueless pair, all four melds are runs, and the winning tile was a two-sided wait

fu.name: DRAGON_PAIR
fu.description: The pair consists of dragon tiles

fu.name: PREVAILING_WIND
fu.description: The pair consists of the prevailing wind (aka round wind)

fu.name: SEAT_WIND
fu.description: The pair consists of the player's seat wind

fu.name: PAIR_WAIT
fu.description: The winning tile completes the pair

fu.name: SINGLE_SIDED_WAIT
fu.description: The winning tile completes a run. Either the hand contains a 1-2 and is waiting on a 3, or the hand contains a 9-8 and is waiting on a 7

fu.name: INSIDE_WAIT
fu.description: The winning tile completes a run and is the middle tile of the run. Example: the hand contains a 3-5 and is waiting on a 4
